lang.headerslogan: Counter picks at League of Legends

err404.title: Error 404 (Not Found)
err404.text: The requested URL <u>{{url}}</u> was not found on this server.

about.description:
We use experts to evaluate each champion.

Team and Solo players from high leagues help us to evaluate counters based of their own experience

Rating is refreshed each month for all heroes and after each patch

details.detail1: Increase (blue) or Decrease (orange) - means how many points champion got/lost since last evaluation.
details.detail2: Overpower (max 100) - means how much champion is stronger compare to selected champion.
details.detail3: Weak (max 100) - means how much champion is weak compare to selected champion.
details.detail4: Less important champions means that there are many another champions better than this one, however it does not mean they are bad choice.

about.growing: Increase - more points since last evaluation
about.drooping: Decrease - less poins since last evaluation
about.less: Less important champions - still a good choice

news.header: Most significant changes for last evaluation

stat.header: Statistic of picklol.net for last month from Google
stat.header2: Statistic for picklol.net for last month
